snippet: When Grigor Dimitrov ended Andy Murray's reign as Wimbledon champion with a no-nonsense quarter-final defeat at the All England Club in 2014, it supposedly heralded the arrival of the "generation next" in men's tennis....
lead_paragraph: When Grigor Dimitrov ended Andy Murray's reign as Wimbledon champion with a no-nonsense quarter-final defeat at the All England Club in 2014, it supposedly heralded the arrival of the "generation next" in men's tennis.

headline.print_headline: Dimitrov Aims to Fix His Shattered Game
headline.main: Dimitrov Aims to Fix His Shattered Game
